synopsis.text: Chibi Godzilla, the beloved tiny titan, makes a triumphant return in the new anime series, Chibi Godzilla Raids Again! The series unfolds on an enigmatic island, shrouded in secrecy from the rest of the world. When a small robotic creature finds itself stranded on its shores, it's met with an unexpectedly warm reception by a unique island inhabitant. As the story progresses, the identity and intentions of this special local, along with the mysteries of the island, begin to unravel. Join Chibi Godzilla on this thrilling adventure filled with surprises and discoveries in a land that's far from ordinary!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
